message.body: $AAPL stupid downgrade.  iPhone X is too popular so that will hurt Apple next couple of years.  I heard it all.  https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/20/apple-shares-downgraded-because-the-iphone-x-is-too-popular.html

links.title: Analyst downgrades Apple to sell because popularity of iPhone X means fewer phone upgrades next year
links.description: The iPhone X is so popular that it just might wind up hurting Apple down the road. It has been so successful that more and more iPhone users are upgrading early, eating into demand for future generations, according to New Street Research.
